I failed the exam.

I'm really sorry to hear that you didn't pass your exam. It can be so disheartening to put in effort and not achieve the result you hoped for. Remember, though, that this is just one step in your journey, and it doesn't define your abilities or future successes. Take some time to reflect, identify areas for improvement, and don't hesitate to seek support if you need it. You've got the strength to bounce back, and your next attempt might just be the breakthrough you’re looking for. Keep going!
